root.name: The Expendables 2
root.description: OverviewThe Expendables 2 is a third person action game published by Ubisoft, and developed by Zootfly. It's a prequel to the Expendables 2 (despite the name suggesting otherwise) and features characters from the original Expendables (Barney Ross, Gunner Jensen, Hale Caesar and Ying Yang) who are on the hunt for a kidnapped millionaire. The game features 4 player co-op as well as on rails sequences from the gun of a plane.The game is scheduled for release around the movie's release (August 2012) and will be available on Xbox Live Marketplace, PSN and on PC.PC System RequirementsMinimum:OS:Windows® XP SP3 / Windows Vista® SP2Processor:Any processor with 2 CoresMemory:2 GB RAMGraphics:Nvidia Geforce 8xxx series or ATI Radeon HD 4xxx seriesHard Drive:4 GB HD spaceSound:DirectX 9.0–compliant sound cardRecommended:OS:Windows® 7 SP1Processor:Any processor with 2 CoresMemory:4 GB RAMGraphics:Nvidia Geforce 2xx series or Radeon HD 5xxx seriesHard Drive:4 GB HD spaceSound:DirectX 9.0–compliant sound card
